survey_name: Gym Member Retention and Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess member satisfaction, identify areas for improvement, and understand factors influencing gym retention to enhance overall service quality.

questions.question_text: How often do you visit the gym in a typical week?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How often do you visit the gym in a typical week?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a gym? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice with max 3 selections. Helps prioritize improvements.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes with max selection limit)

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a gym? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness of the gym facilities?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale for nuanced feedback. Ensure mobile responsiveness.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons with horizontal layout)

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness of the gym facilities?

questions.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to visit the gym more frequently?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is 'Less than once a week' or '1-2 times per week'
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative insights. Limit to 250 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT (text area with character limit)

script.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to visit the gym more frequently?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is 'Less than once a week' or '1-2 times per week'

questions.question_text: How likely are you to renew your membership when it expires?
questions.client_notes: Critical retention metric. Use a prominent single-choice scale.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (required question, star rating visual optional)

script.question_text: How likely are you to renew your membership when it expires?
